newsitem.title: ITALY: Italian Sept industrial turnover down 2.4 pct.
newsitem.headline: Italian Sept industrial turnover down 2.4 pct.

text.p: Italian industrial turnover fell 2.4 percent year-on-year in September, while orders fell 6.5 percent, national statistics institute ISTAT said.
Year on year change -2.4 pct -6.6 pct +12.0 pct
Year on year change -6.5 pct -6.5 pct +13.6 pct

Note: Istat said the fall in turnover was especially marked in the metal industry (-13.9 percent), in paper goods and publishing (-5.0 percent), in rubber and plastic goods (-4.7 percent) and in chemicals and synthetic fibres (-4.2 percent), while turnover rose 5.5 percent in leather goods, 5.1 percent in machinery and 4.9 percent in the oil industry.

For orders, the only rise was in the leather goods industry (10.4 percent) while falls were registered in the metals industry (-13.8 percent), paper goods (-12.8 percent) and the transport industry (-11.3).
